pullRequest.body:
Now we use letters X, Y, Z and W for topological spaces, not Greek letters.

Also rename associated variables (a : X) to (x : X), etc., and hypotheses.
I didn't replace all letters; some lemmas need a large number of different letters. Volunteers for the last instances welcome.

---

Best reviewed commit by commit.

<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body:
Thanks for the careful comments. I have updated the code accordingly.
awaiting-review

:v: grunweg can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Thanks again for the review. I pushed some last changes (renaming misleading variables); let me know if you prefer some changes to these (happy to make them after the fact).
bors r+

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7652381238/job/20852031319)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7652381238/job/20852030518)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7652381238/job/20852031056)
It should be `X : α → Type*`, not `X : X → Type*`.
Sure. I've changed to use \iota as indexing type (as many other files also do).
Same here: the index type has no topology, so it shouldn't be named `X`.
I also just pushed a commit doing the same replacement across this file. (Happy to pull into its own PR.)

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore(Topology/Constructions): rename most type variables
